philosophy.title: How we work
philosophy.text:
We approach each project with a hands-on, personalised method. We are involved from the first meeting to the key handover, with close attention to every phase of the construction process.

We work with quality materials and trusted craftsmen and suppliers. We like to mix contemporary pieces with vintage finds, always seeking functional, light-filled and timeless spaces.

team.text: We are a multidisciplinary team of architects, interior designers and decorators. We share a passion for detail and commitment to every project.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.metaDescription: Privacy policy and data protection of Garnica Miguelena S.L.

purpose.title: Purpose of Processing
purpose.intro: The personal data you provide will be processed for the following purposes:
purpose.item1: Managing enquiries and information requests received through the contact form.
purpose.item2: Sending commercial communications about our services, provided you have given your consent.
purpose.item3: Managing commercial and contractual relationships with our clients.

legitimation.title: Legal Basis
legitimation.text: The legal basis for processing your data is the consent you provide when contacting us, as well as our legitimate interest in responding to your enquiries and the execution of a contract when a commercial relationship exists.

recipients.title: Recipients
recipients.text: We will not transfer your personal data to third parties, except as required by law. Service providers necessary for the operation of the website (hosting, email) may have access to your data, with whom we have signed data processing agreements.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.intro: You may exercise the following rights regarding your personal data:
rights.accessDesc: Know what personal data we are processing.
rights.rectificationDesc: Request the correction of inaccurate data.
rights.deletionDesc: Request the deletion of your data when no longer necessary.
rights.oppositionDesc: Object to the processing of your data in certain circumstances.
rights.portabilityDesc: Receive your data in a structured format to transfer to another controller.
rights.limitationDesc: Request the restriction of processing in certain cases.
rights.howTo: To exercise these rights, you may contact us at info@garnicamiguelena.com, attaching a copy of your ID. You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the Spanish Data Protection Agency (www.aepd.es).

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.text: We will retain your personal data as long as a commercial relationship exists or until you exercise your right to erasure. Once the relationship ends, data will be retained for the applicable legal periods to address potential liabilities.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.intro: This website uses cookies to improve the browsing experience:
cookies.technicalDesc: Necessary for the basic functioning of the website.
cookies.analyticsDesc: Allow us to analyse website usage anonymously to improve our services.
cookies.disable: You can configure your browser to reject cookies or to alert you when cookies are being sent. However, if you reject technical cookies, some website functionalities may not be available.

security.title: Security
security.text: We have adopted the necessary technical and organisational measures to ensure the security of your personal data and prevent its alteration, loss, unauthorised processing or access, in accordance with the state of technology and the nature of the data stored.

changes.title: Changes
changes.text: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy to adapt it to legislative or case law developments. In case of significant changes, we will inform you through our website.
